guide.introduction:
• Create original design and concept using hand drawn sketches.
  • Convert sketches to CAD drawings using AutoCAD or Google Sketchup.
  • Purchase materials accordingly.
  • Customize desk and drawing area with shelves, space for computer and keyboard.

guide.summary: Designing a drafting table with an attached drawing area. Using a hinge, I will create an adjustable drawing area that can be adjusted between 0 and 45 degrees.
